problems.title: Count Anagram Substrings
problems.description:
Given two strings s and p, count how many substrings of s are anagrams of p.

Input Format:
First line: string s (no spaces).
Second line: string p (no spaces).

Output Format:
Print a single integer: the count of substrings of s that are anagrams of p.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
forxxorfxdofr
for

Sample Output
3

Explanation:
The anagram substrings are 'for', 'orf', and 'ofr'.
hintsList: Use a frequency array for p and a sliding window frequency array for the current window in s.
Slide the window of size |p| over s, updating counts in O(1), and compare the frequency arrays to check for an anagram.
